item.title: Exception
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Well, i dont know what else to do, so
Post Stream.java Line 34
Post Client.java Line 3511
Post Client.java line 5021
Post Client.java line 7610
Post Playerhandler.java Line 402
Post Playerhandler.java Line 394
Post Playerhandler.java Line 265
Post Process.java Line 23
And Post Thread.java Line 619. Im not even sure if Thread.java is in yours, its not in mine, but if you have it, post the line!
Until i have seen those lines, i cannot diagnose the problem
